text: Gu kha suaŋgi buneŋ, ne guigira gu ŋanŋangi guma nzuai mbugum suaŋgi. Nde nduarira, nde na muuŋgim, gu mba buneŋ suaŋgi. Nde nan tɨvar vhuuŋ bun suaŋgirga tuktɨgi, nde ne bun suangeŋ thagim, gu nduara ne bun suaŋgi. Khueŋ guigi guarara, gu guigira guma khɨn ma. Gu zɨ ki fhu. Mbe gumgi mbari khaŋ nzuai, “Nza Zisas farasegi ŋaarar muunga zɨri ki gumgi,” gu nde ntɨɨri piin ki fhuvara.
